overview: Naomi, who has been running an Onigiri shop by herself since her divorce, can't stop her heart from fluttering when a young customer, Sota, acts as if he has a crush on her. Then, she meets her ex-husband Masato (Junichi Haruta) by chance, and he urges her to start over again.
title: Wakareta Nyoubou no Koibito
